mapper.select: SELECT c.community_id AS communityId, c.title, c.content, c.image, c.category, c.user_id AS userId, c.created_at AS createdAt, c.viewcount, u.nickname FROM Community c LEFT JOIN "User" u ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE c.community_id = #{communityId}

SELECT c.community_id AS communityId, c.title, c.content, c.image, c.category, c.user_id AS userId, c.created_at AS createdAt, c.viewcount, u.nickname, NVL( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "Comment" x WHERE x.community_id = c.community_id), 0) AS commentCount FROM Community c JOIN "User" u ON u.user_id = c.user_id
AND c.category = #{category}
AND ( LOWER(c.title) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{q} || '%') OR LOWER(u.nickname) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{q} || '%') )
ORDER BY c.community_id DESC
OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE Community SET viewcount = viewcount + 1 WHERE community_id = #{communityId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Community (title, content, image, category, user_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{image,jdbcType=BLOB}, #{category}, #{userId})
